sentences.en: Boys and girls will enjoy messing about with any kind of machine.
sentences.cn: 男孩和女孩会喜欢摆弄各种机械装置。

sentences.en: Get me a sandwich – any kind will do.
sentences.cn: 给我一份三明治，随便哪种都可以。

sentences.en: Have you been able to have any kind of contact?
sentences.cn: 你联系上了吗？

sentences.en: I also met with Pollack again to kind of shoot the bull.
sentences.cn: 我也再次和波拉克会面，两人闲聊了会儿。

sentences.en: I don't apologize to her kind ever.
sentences.cn: 我绝不会向她这种人道歉。

sentences.en: I don't know why he bothers me with this kind of rubbish.
sentences.cn: 我不明白他为何用这种烂事来烦我。

sentences.en: I fell in love with him because of his kind nature.
sentences.cn: 我爱上他，是因为他秉性善良。

sentences.en: I'm kind of hungry.
sentences.cn: 我有些饿了

sentences.en: it got kind of cosy.
sentences.cn: 这儿变得相当舒适。

sentences.en: It wasn’t a very kind thing to say.
sentences.cn: 这么说可不太客气。

sentences.en: Ms Jarvis is unable to accept your kind invitation.
sentences.cn: 贾维斯女士无法接受您的盛情邀请。

sentences.en: my son had done nothing of the kind before.
sentences.cn: 我儿子以前没干过类似的事情。

sentences.en: Not everyone in the world will be kind and caring towards you.
sentences.cn: 并非世上每个人都会对你友善关心。

sentences.en: pay in kind.
sentences.cn: 用实物支付

sentences.en: returned the slight in kind.
sentences.cn: 用同样方式还以蔑视

sentences.en: she and her sister were two of a kind.
sentences.cn: 她和她妹妹一模一样。

sentences.en: She’s a very kind and generous person.
sentences.cn: 她是个很和蔼大方的人。

sentences.en: teaching based on a kind of inspired guesswork.
sentences.cn: 基于几分有灵感的臆测的教学。

sentences.en: Thank you for your help. You’ve been most kind (= said when thanking someone very politely ).
sentences.cn: 谢谢您的帮助，您真是太好了。

sentences.en: That is very kind of you both. I should like to come.
sentences.cn: 你们两位真是太客气了。我会来的。

sentences.en: That's just one example of the kind of experiments you can do.
sentences.cn: 这只不过是你可以做的各种试验中的一例罢了。

sentences.en: That's not the kind of talk one usually hears from accountants.
sentences.cn: 会计们通常不会说那样的话.

sentences.en: The following recipe is a statement of another kind—food is fun!
sentences.cn: 下面的食谱是另一种观点的表现——食物可以带来乐趣！

sentences.en: The sketch should be a kind of rehearsal for the eventual painting.
sentences.cn: 草图应该是最终绘画的某种演练。

sentences.en: there is tribute, of a kind, in such popularity.
sentences.cn: 有些徒有其名的礼物，这么受欢迎。

sentences.en: There'sno need for that kind of language in this magazine.
sentences.cn: 这份杂志没必要出现那种语言。

sentences.en: they had always suspected something of the kind.
sentences.cn: 他们总是怀疑有类似的事物。

sentences.en: This kind of living was beginning to fray her nerves.
sentences.cn: 这种生活开始让她神经紧张。

sentences.en: This kind of speaker box was handcrafted.
sentences.cn: 这种音箱的箱体是手工制作的。

sentences.en: this new building was no doubt excellent of its kind.
sentences.cn: 这幢新建筑无疑是同类之中极好的。

sentences.en: Unconscious envy manifests itself very often as this kind of arrogance.
sentences.cn: 潜意识里的嫉妒常表现为这种傲慢自大。

sentences.en: We have all kinds of time to finish the job.
sentences.cn: 我们有充足的时间完成这项工作

sentences.en: we stick with our own kind.
sentences.cn: 我们和同类的人在一起。

sentences.en: We thanked the priest for his kind words.
sentences.cn: 我们对牧师亲切的话语表示感谢。

sentences.en: You're a nice girl, Lettie, and your kind heart does you credit.
sentences.cn: 你是个好女孩儿，莱蒂，你的善良值得称赞。

words.tran_cn: 亲切的；和蔼的；体贴的；爽快的
亲切的;有同情心的;宽容的

phrases.tran_cn: 以同样方法：用同样的方法或用等价物
毫不相似的事物；绝非如此的事物
［用以表示对某种人的轻蔑］某某人之类，某某人之流

phrases.phrase: two (或 three, four 等) of a kind

trans.tran_en: saying or doing things that show that you care about other people and want to help them or make them happy
one of the different types of a person or thing that belong to the same group
